items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
Lisa Larson

Lisa Larson's warm touch and humorous, cute animal motifs, much loved by fans around the world, are now incorporated into these new designs in calm and gentle colors.

Lisa Larson
Lisa Larson is a Swedish ceramist with many fans worldwide. Larson joined Gustavsberg Factory, a leading Swedish ceramic manufacturer, where for over twenty years, she worked as a designer, producing several hundred pieces of work. In 1980, Larson left Gustavsberg Factory to work independently. In 1992, she established Keramikstudion Gustavsberg, where she continues to create new works to this day.

Lisa & Johanna Larson

- 100% cotton fabric with a smooth, cool feel.
- Straight cut.
- Convenient pockets.
- 10cm longer in-seam for more practical and versatile design.
items.name: Lisa Larson Relaco 3/4 Shorts
items.shortDescription: Lisa Larson is a popular Scandinavian artist. Some of her adorable animals are back in Uniqlo this season.

items.longDescription:
BLUE NOTE RECORDS

Blue Note Records, a label specializing in jazz, has been delighting music lovers all over the world since its launch in New York in 1939. Extremely famous records that have carved out their place in jazz history have returned to the UT collection.

Courtesy of Blue Note Records, under license from Universal Music Enterprises, a division of UMG Recordings, Inc.
items.name: Blue Note Records UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Famous records representing the world of jazz have been picked up from the legendary jazz music label, Blue Note Records.

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
Keith Haring 1st Exhibition

On view from October 9 - November 13,1982, at the Tony Shafrazi Gallery in NYC, Keith Haring's first major exhibition was energetic and it propelled him onto the main stage of the New York art scene. The opening was packed from wall to wall and artists, art critics, art dealers, friends, and young kids, all mingling and have fun!

Keith Haring
A key figure in New Yorks East Village scene in the late 1970s and 80s, American artist Keith Harings artwork populated not only art galleries, but also the citys subways, streets, and sidewalks. His work often combined an iconographic vocabulary, including hearts, flying saucers, winged figures, and a crawling radiant baby, with abstract marks and patterning.

Keith Haring Foundation. Licensed by Artestar, New York.
items.name: Keith Haring UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Keith Haring's first exhibition artworks in the UT collection.

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
Pokmon Meets Artist SS22

Since its creation in 1996, Pokmon has been loved by people worldwide. This collection features the participation of magma, a new artist duo attracting attention worldwide. Their creativity has produced a collection full of new Pokmon charm and appeal!

artist unit: magma
An artist unit by Jun Sugiyama and Kenichi Miyazawa. They use their unique outlook to create works with waste materials, resin, and motor appliances, and have expanded into furniture, products, and space direction. They are garnering much attention both domestically and abroad for their vaguely nostalgic works that fuse analogue and crazy colors.

2022 Pokmon.
1995-2022 Nintendo/Creatures Inc./GAME FREAK inc.
items.name: Pokemon UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Pokmon as art! A new Pokmon collection created through an encounter with art is coming to UT!

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
Pokmon Meets Artist SS22

Since its creation in 1996, Pokmon has been loved by people worldwide. This collection features the participation of magma, a new artist duo attracting attention worldwide. Their creativity has produced a collection full of new Pokmon charm and appeal!

artist unit: magma
An artist unit by Jun Sugiyama and Kenichi Miyazawa. They use their unique outlook to create works with waste materials, resin, and motor appliances, and have expanded into furniture, products, and space direction. They are garnering much attention both domestically and abroad for their vaguely nostalgic works that fuse analogue and crazy colors.

2022 Pokmon.
1995-2022 Nintendo/Creatures Inc./GAME FREAK inc.
items.name: Pokemon UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Pokmon as art! A new Pokmon collection created through an encounter with art is coming to UT!

items.composition: Tops: 70% Viscose, 30% Cotton/ Bottoms: 68% Viscose, 29% Cotton, 3% Elastane
items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
Lisa Larson

Lisa Larson's warm touch and humorous, cute animal motifs, much loved by fans around the world, are now incorporated into these new designs in calm and gentle colors.

Lisa Larson
Lisa Larson is a Swedish ceramist with many fans worldwide. Larson joined Gustavsberg Factory, a leading Swedish ceramic manufacturer, where for over twenty years, she worked as a designer, producing several hundred pieces of work. In 1980, Larson left Gustavsberg Factory to work independently. In 1992, she established Keramikstudion Gustavsberg, where she continues to create new works to this day.

Lisa & Johanna Larson
items.name: Lisa Larson Lounge Set (Short Sleeve)
items.shortDescription: Lisa Larson is a popular Scandinavian artist. Some of her adorable animals are back in Uniqlo this season.

- Original MARNI logo on the zipper pull.
- Colorful lining adds a quintessentially MARNI style accent.
